body_html:
You can bypass the LNK1000 error by selectively applying /WHOLEARCHIVE option only to the necessary static libraries. I managed to get with this set as a starting point for my experiments:
/WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_direct_session.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_ops.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_lib.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_cc_framework.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_framework.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_cpu.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_stream_executor.lib
body_text:
You can bypass the LNK1000 error by selectively applying /WHOLEARCHIVE option only to the necessary static libraries. I managed to get with this set as a starting point for my experiments:
/WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_direct_session.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_ops.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_lib.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_cc_framework.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_framework.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_cpu.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_stream_executor.lib
body:
You can bypass the LNK1000 error by selectively applying /WHOLEARCHIVE option only to the necessary static libraries. I managed to get with this set as a starting point for my experiments:
`/WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_direct_session.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_ops.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_lib.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_cc_framework.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_framework.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_core_cpu.lib /WHOLEARCHIVE:tf_stream_executor.lib`
